sentences.en: Corrections will be issued after the end of the session a corrigendum for each Committee.
sentences.cn: 各项更正将在本届会议结束后汇编成各委员会单册印发.

sentences.en: Corrigendum 1 - Amendment 1 - Household and similar electrical appliances - Safety - Part 2 - 40 : Particular requirements for electrical pumps, air - conditioners and dehumidifiers.
sentences.cn: 勘误表 1— 修改1---家用和类似电器 --- 安全性 --- 第2-40部分: 电热泵 、 空气循环和减湿器的专门要求.
